snippet: A Morgan Stanley broker was with Anna Gristina — who has been accused of running a brothel on the Upper East Side of Manhattan — at the time of her arrest.
abstract: A Morgan Stanley broker was with Anna Gristina — who has been accused of running a brothel on the Upper East Side of Manhattan — at the time of her arrest.

headline.main: Broker With Ties to Accused Brothel Operator Is Identified
